message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $14000. This is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $12500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save as much as possible. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a counteroffer of $13750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to sell the product for, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $13000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're still looking to save as much as possible. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to make a new counteroffer of $13500. This is the best price I can offer, considering the value the product holds for me.

I appreciate your new offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $13500. I'm willing to make a final counteroffer of $12800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to pay for the product, considering its value to me.
